net.sf.JRecord.Types

Class TypeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Types.TypeManager

  • public class TypeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores / retrieves type definitions and format definitions i.e. it is a repository for type and format definitions.

    It also stores the system TypeManager (retrieved via method getSystemTypeManager).

    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
